mapper.select: /* Roles.selectRoles */ SELECT r.rol_no, r.rol_nm, r.reg_date, r.reg_no, r.mod_date, r.mod_no FROM ROLES r ORDER BY ROL_NO ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: /* Roles.insertRoles */ INSERT INTO ROLES ( rol_no, rol_nm, reg_date, reg_no, mod_date, mod_no ) VALUES ( #{rolNo}, #{rolNm}, #{regDate}, #{regNo}, #{modDate}, #{modNo} )
mapper.select: /* Roles.selectRoleMenus */ SELECT MR.ROL_NO, MR.MNU_NO, MR.MNU_CREATE, MR.MNU_READ, MR.MNU_UPDATE, MR.MNU_DELETE, R.ROL_NM, M.URL_ADR FROM MENU_ROLES MR INNER JOIN ROLES R ON R.ROL_NO = R.ROL_NO INNER JOIN MENU M ON MR.MNU_NO = M.MNU_NO WHERE R.ROL_NM = #{rolNm} AND M.USE_YN = TRUE
/* Roles.selectRoleList */ SELECT r.rol_no, r.rol_nm, r.reg_date, r.reg_no, r.mod_date, r.mod_no FROM ROLES r ORDER BY ROL_NO ASC
